definition: To rest your mind and body by closing your eyes and becoming unconscious.
example: I need to sleep for at least eight hours tonight.
koExample: 나는 오늘 밤 적어도 8시간은 자야 한다.
koChirpScript: sleep. 잠자다 라는 뜻입니다. I need to sleep for at least eight hours tonight. 나는 오늘 밤 적어도 8시간은 자야 한다.

definition: Moving or operating at a low speed; not quick or fast.
example: This is a very slow train.
koChirpScript: slow. 느린 이라는 뜻입니다. This is a very slow train. 이것은 매우 느린 기차이다.

definition: Of a size that is less than normal or usual.
example: I live in a small apartment.
koChirpScript: small. 작은 이라는 뜻입니다. I live in a small apartment. 나는 작은 아파트에 산다.

definition: Having or showing a quick-witted intelligence.
example: She is a very smart student.
koChirpScript: smart. 똑똑한 이라는 뜻입니다. She is a very smart student. 그녀는 매우 똑똑한 학생이다.

definition: A long limbless reptile that has no eyelids, a short tail, and jaws that are capable of considerable extension.
example: I am afraid of snakes.
koChirpScript: snake. 뱀 이라는 뜻입니다. I am afraid of snakes. 나는 뱀을 무서워한다.

definition: Atmospheric water vapor frozen into ice crystals and falling in light white flakes or lying on the ground as a white layer.
example: The children are playing in the snow. It started to snow.
koExample: 아이들이 눈 속에서 놀고 있다. 눈이 오기 시작했다.
koChirpScript: snow. 눈 또는 눈이 오다 라는 뜻입니다. The children are playing in the snow. 아이들이 눈 속에서 놀고 있다. It started to snow. 눈이 오기 시작했다.

definition: To such a great extent; and for this reason; therefore.
example: It was so cold that I wore a coat. I was tired, so I went to bed.
koExample: 너무 추워서 나는 코트를 입었다. 나는 피곤해서 잠자리에 들었다.
koChirpScript: so. 매우 또는 그래서 라는 뜻입니다. It was so cold that I wore a coat. 너무 추워서 나는 코트를 입었다. I was tired, so I went to bed. 나는 피곤해서 잠자리에 들었다.

definition: An unspecified amount or number of.
example: I need some sugar.
koChirpScript: some. 약간의 또는 몇몇의 라는 뜻입니다. I need some sugar. 설탕이 좀 필요하다.

definition: Someone.
example: Somebody is at the door.
koChirpScript: somebody. 누군가 라는 뜻입니다. someone과 같은 의미입니다. Somebody is at the door. 누군가 문 앞에 있다.

definition: An unspecified person.
example: I need to talk to someone.
koChirpScript: someone. 누군가 라는 뜻입니다. somebody와 같은 의미입니다. I need to talk to someone. 나는 누군가와 이야기해야 한다.

definition: A thing that is unspecified or unknown.
example: I have something to tell you.
koChirpScript: something. 무언가 라는 뜻입니다. I have something to tell you. 너에게 할 말이 있다.

definition: Occasionally, rather than all of the time.
example: I sometimes go for a walk in the evening.
koChirpScript: sometimes. 때때로 또는 가끔 이라는 뜻의 빈도부사입니다. I sometimes go for a walk in the evening. 나는 가끔 저녁에 산책하러 간다.

definition: A boy or man in relation to either or both of his parents.
example: He is my son.
koChirpScript: son. 아들 이라는 뜻입니다. He is my son. 그는 나의 아들이다.

definition: A short poem or other set of words set to music or meant to be sung.
example: This is my favorite song.
koChirpScript: song. 노래 라는 뜻입니다. This is my favorite song. 이것은 내가 가장 좋아하는 노래이다.

definition: In or after a short time.
example: See you soon.
koChirpScript: soon. 곧 이라는 뜻입니다. See you soon. 곧 봐요.

definition: Feeling distress, especially through sympathy with someone else's misfortune.
example: I'm sorry to hear that.
koChirpScript: sorry. 미안한 또는 유감스러운 이라는 뜻입니다. I'm sorry to hear that. 그 말을 들으니 유감이다.

definition: Vibrations that travel through the air or another medium and can be heard when they reach a person's or animal's ear; emit or cause to emit sound.
example: What's that sound? That sounds like a good idea.
koExample: 저게 무슨 소리지? 좋은 생각처럼 들린다.
koChirpScript: sound. 소리 또는 무엇무엇처럼 들리다 라는 뜻입니다. What's that sound? 저게 무슨 소리지? That sounds like a good idea. 좋은 생각처럼 들린다.

definition: A liquid dish, typically made by boiling ingredients in stock or water.
example: I'd like a bowl of chicken soup.
koChirpScript: soup. 수프 라는 뜻입니다. I'd like a bowl of chicken soup. 치킨 수프 한 그릇 주세요.

definition: The direction toward the point of the horizon 90° clockwise from east, or the part of the horizon lying in this direction.
example: Many birds fly south for the winter.
koGloss: n. 남쪽; adj. 남쪽의; adv. 남쪽으로
koExample: 많은 새들이 겨울을 나기 위해 남쪽으로 날아간다.
koChirpScript: south. 남쪽 이라는 뜻입니다. Many birds fly south for the winter. 많은 새들이 겨울을 나기 위해 남쪽으로 날아간다.

definition: A continuous area or expanse which is free, available, or unoccupied.
example: There is not enough space for a table.
koChirpScript: space. 공간 또는 우주 라는 뜻입니다. There is not enough space for a table. 테이블을 놓을 공간이 충분하지 않다.

definition: Say something in order to convey information, an opinion, or a feeling.
example: Can you speak more slowly, please?
koChirpScript: speak. 말하다 라는 뜻입니다. Can you speak more slowly, please? 좀 더 천천히 말씀해 주시겠어요?

definition: Better, greater, or otherwise different from what is usual.
example: This is a very special occasion.
koChirpScript: special. 특별한 이라는 뜻입니다. This is a very special occasion. 이것은 매우 특별한 행사이다.

definition: Write or name the letters that form (a word) in correct sequence.
example: How do you spell your name?
koChirpScript: spell. 철자를 말하다 라는 뜻입니다. How do you spell your name? 이름 철자가 어떻게 되세요?

definition: The process or activity of writing or naming the letters of a word.
example: My spelling is not very good.
koChirpScript: spelling. 철자법 이라는 뜻입니다. My spelling is not very good. 나는 철자법에 그다지 능숙하지 않다.

definition: Pay out (money) in buying or hiring goods or services.
example: I spend a lot of money on books.
koChirpScript: spend. 돈을 쓰다 또는 시간을 보내다 라는 뜻입니다. I spend a lot of money on books. 나는 책에 많은 돈을 쓴다.

definition: An activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment.
example: What's your favorite sport?
koChirpScript: sport. 스포츠 또는 운동 이라는 뜻입니다. What's your favorite sport? 가장 좋아하는 스포츠는 무엇인가요?

definition: The season after winter and before summer, in which vegetation begins to appear.
example: Flowers bloom in the spring.
koChirpScript: spring. 봄 이라는 뜻입니다. Flowers bloom in the spring. 봄에는 꽃이 핀다.

definition: Have or maintain an upright position, supported by one's feet.
example: Please stand up.
koChirpScript: stand. 서다 라는 뜻입니다. Please stand up. 일어서 주세요.

definition: A fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.
example: Look at the stars in the sky.
koChirpScript: star. 별 이라는 뜻입니다. Look at the stars in the sky. 하늘의 별들을 봐.

definition: Begin or be reckoned from a particular point in time or space.
example: The movie starts at 7 p.m.
koChirpScript: start. 시작하다 라는 뜻입니다. The movie starts at 7 p.m. 영화는 오후 7시에 시작한다.

definition: A definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing.
example: The police took his statement.
koChirpScript: statement. 진술 또는 성명 이라는 뜻입니다. The police took his statement. 경찰은 그의 진술을 받았다.

definition: A regular stopping place on a public transportation route, especially one on a railroad line with a platform and often one or more buildings.
example: I'll meet you at the train station.
koChirpScript: station. 역 또는 정거장 이라는 뜻입니다. I'll meet you at the train station. 기차역에서 만나요.

definition: Remain in the same place.
example: I'm going to stay at home tonight.
koExample: 나는 오늘 밤 집에 머무를 것이다.
koChirpScript: stay. 머무르다 라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to stay at home tonight. 나는 오늘 밤 집에 머무를 것이다.

definition: Up to and including the present or the time mentioned; even now (or then) as formerly.
example: Are you still here?
koChirpScript: still. 아직도 또는 여전히 라는 뜻입니다. Are you still here? 아직도 여기 있니?

definition: Come to an end; cease to happen; an instance of stopping or being stopped.
example: Please stop talking. The bus came to a stop.
koExample: 말하는 것을 멈춰주세요. 버스가 멈춰 섰다.
koChirpScript: stop. 멈추다 또는 정지 라는 뜻입니다. Please stop talking. 말하는 것을 멈춰주세요. The bus came to a stop. 버스가 멈춰 섰다.

definition: A place where things are sold.
example: I'm going to the grocery store.
koChirpScript: store. 가게 또는 상점 이라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to the grocery store. 나는 식료품점에 갈 것이다.

definition: An account of imaginary or real people and events told for entertainment.
example: He told me an interesting story.
koChirpScript: story. 이야기 라는 뜻입니다. He told me an interesting story. 그는 나에게 흥미로운 이야기를 해주었다.

definition: A public road in a city or town, typically with houses and buildings on one or both sides.
example: My house is on this street.
koChirpScript: street. 거리 또는 길 이라는 뜻입니다. My house is on this street. 우리 집은 이 거리에 있다.

definition: Having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks.
example: He is a strong man.
koChirpScript: strong. 힘센 또는 강한 이라는 뜻입니다. He is a strong man. 그는 힘센 남자이다.

definition: A person who is studying at a school or college.
example: I am a student.
koChirpScript: student. 학생 이라는 뜻입니다. I am a student. 나는 학생이다.

definition: The devotion of time and attention to acquiring knowledge on an academic subject, especially by means of books; devote time and attention to acquiring knowledge on (an academic subject), especially by means of books.
example: I need to study for my exam. His study is full of books.
koExample: 나는 시험공부를 해야 한다. 그의 서재는 책으로 가득 차 있다.
koChirpScript: study. 공부 또는 서재, 그리고 공부하다 라는 뜻입니다. I need to study for my exam. 나는 시험공부를 해야 한다. His study is full of books. 그의 서재는 책으로 가득 차 있다.

definition: A particular procedure by which something is done; a manner or way.
example: I like your style of writing.
koChirpScript: style. 스타일 또는 방식 이라는 뜻입니다. I like your style of writing. 나는 당신의 글쓰기 스타일을 좋아한다.

definition: A branch of knowledge studied or taught in a school, college, or university.
example: What's your favorite subject?
koChirpScript: subject. 과목 또는 주제 라는 뜻입니다. What's your favorite subject? 가장 좋아하는 과목은 무엇인가요?

definition: The accomplishment of an aim or purpose.
example: Hard work is the key to success.
koChirpScript: success. 성공 이라는 뜻입니다. Hard work is the key to success. 노력은 성공의 열쇠이다.

definition: A sweet crystalline substance obtained from various plants, especially sugar cane and sugar beet, consisting essentially of sucrose, and used as a sweetener in food and drink.
example: Do you take sugar in your coffee?
koChirpScript: sugar. 설탕 이라는 뜻입니다. Do you take sugar in your coffee? 커피에 설탕을 넣으시나요?

definition: The warmest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from June to August and in the southern hemisphere from December to February.
example: I love the summer.
koChirpScript: summer. 여름 이라는 뜻입니다. I love the summer. 나는 여름을 아주 좋아한다.

definition: The star around which the earth orbits.
example: The sun is shining.
koChirpScript: sun. 태양 또는 해 라는 뜻입니다. The sun is shining. 해가 빛나고 있다.

definition: The day of the week before Monday and following Saturday, observed by Christians as a day of rest and worship.
example: What are you doing on Sunday?
koChirpScript: Sunday. 일요일 이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing on Sunday? 일요일에 뭐 하니?

definition: A large self-service store selling foods and household goods.
example: I'm going to the supermarket to buy some groceries.
koExample: 나는 식료품을 사러 슈퍼마켓에 갈 것이다.
koChirpScript: supermarket. 슈퍼마켓 이라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to the supermarket to buy some groceries. 나는 식료품을 사러 슈퍼마켓에 갈 것이다.

definition: Completely confident that one is right.
example: Are you sure about that?
koChirpScript: sure. 확신하는 이라는 뜻입니다. Are you sure about that? 그것에 대해 확신하나요?

definition: A knitted garment worn on the upper part of the body, typically with long sleeves, put on over the head.
example: It's cold, so I'm wearing a warm sweater.
koChirpScript: sweater. 스웨터 라는 뜻입니다. It's cold, so I'm wearing a warm sweater. 추워서 따뜻한 스웨터를 입고 있다.

definition: Propel the body through water by using the limbs, or (in the case of a fish or other aquatic animal) by using the tail and fins.
example: I like to swim in the ocean.
koChirpScript: swim. 수영하다 라는 뜻입니다. I like to swim in the ocean. 나는 바다에서 수영하는 것을 좋아한다.

definition: The sport or activity of propelling oneself through water using the limbs.
example: Swimming is a great exercise.
koChirpScript: swimming. 수영 이라는 뜻입니다. Swimming is a great exercise. 수영은 훌륭한 운동이다.

definition: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface on which objects may be placed.
example: The book is on the table.
koChirpScript: table. 테이블 또는 식탁 이라는 뜻입니다. The book is on the table. 책이 테이블 위에 있다.

definition: Lay hold of (something) with one's hands; reach for and hold.
example: Please take a seat.
koChirpScript: take. 가져가다, 타다, 시간이 걸리다 등 매우 다양하게 쓰이는 동사입니다. Please take a seat. 자리에 앉으세요.

definition: Speak in order to give information or express ideas or feelings; converse or communicate by spoken words.
example: Let's talk about our plans.
koChirpScript: talk. 이야기하다 라는 뜻입니다. Let's talk about our plans. 우리의 계획에 대해 이야기하자.

definition: Of great or more than average height, especially (with reference to an object) relative to width.
example: He is a tall man.
koChirpScript: tall. 키가 큰 이라는 뜻입니다. He is a tall man. 그는 키가 큰 남자이다.

definition: A motor vehicle licensed to transport passengers in return for payment of a fare and typically fitted with a taximeter.
example: Let's take a taxi.
koChirpScript: taxi. 택시 라는 뜻입니다. Let's take a taxi. 택시를 타자.

definition: A hot drink made by infusing the dried crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
example: Would you like a cup of tea?
koChirpScript: tea. 차 라는 뜻입니다. Would you like a cup of tea? 차 한 잔 하시겠어요?

definition: Impart knowledge to or instruct (someone) as to how to do something.
example: She teaches English at a high school.
koChirpScript: teach. 가르치다 라는 뜻입니다. She teaches English at a high school. 그녀는 고등학교에서 영어를 가르친다.

definition: A person who teaches, especially in a school.
example: My teacher is very kind.
koChirpScript: teacher. 선생님 이라는 뜻입니다. My teacher is very kind. 나의 선생님은 매우 친절하시다.

definition: A group of players forming one side in a competitive game or sport.
example: He is the captain of the football team.
koChirpScript: team. 팀 이라는 뜻입니다. He is the captain of the football team. 그는 축구팀의 주장이다.

definition: A person aged between 13 and 19 years.
example: My son is a teenager.
koChirpScript: teenager. 십 대 라는 뜻입니다. My son is a teenager. 내 아들은 십 대이다.

definition: A system for transmitting voices over a distance using wire or radio, by converting acoustic vibrations to electrical signals; to contact someone using the telephone.
example: The telephone is ringing. I'll telephone you tomorrow.
koChirpScript: telephone. 전화기 또는 전화하다 라는 뜻입니다. The telephone is ringing. 전화기가 울리고 있다. I'll telephone you tomorrow. 내일 전화할게.

definition: A system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens, chiefly used to broadcast programs for entertainment, information, and education.
example: I watch television every evening.
koChirpScript: television. 텔레비전 이라는 뜻입니다. I watch television every evening. 나는 매일 저녁 텔레비전을 본다.

definition: Communicate information, facts, or news to someone in spoken or written words.
example: Can you tell me the time?
koChirpScript: tell. 말하다 라는 뜻입니다. Can you tell me the time? 시간 좀 알려주시겠어요?

definition: Equivalent to the product of two and five; one more than nine; 10.
example: I have ten fingers.
koExample: 나는 열 개의 손가락을 가지고 있다.
koChirpScript: ten. 숫자 10을 의미합니다. I have ten fingers. 나는 열 개의 손가락을 가지고 있다.

definition: A game in which two or four players strike a ball with rackets over a net stretched across a court.
example: Let's play tennis.
koChirpScript: tennis. 테니스 라는 뜻입니다. Let's play tennis. 테니스 치자.

definition: Extremely or distressingly bad or serious.
example: The weather was terrible.
koChirpScript: terrible. 끔찍한 또는 형편없는 이라는 뜻입니다. The weather was terrible. 날씨가 끔찍했다.

definition: A procedure intended to establish the quality, performance, or reliability of something, especially before it is taken into widespread use; take measures to check the quality, performance, or reliability of (something), especially before putting it into widespread use or practice.
example: I have a math test tomorrow. The doctor will test your blood.
koExample: 나는 내일 수학 시험이 있다. 의사가 당신의 피를 검사할 것이다.
koChirpScript: test. 시험 또는 시험하다, 검사하다 라는 뜻입니다. I have a math test tomorrow. 나는 내일 수학 시험이 있다. The doctor will test your blood. 의사가 당신의 피를 검사할 것이다.

definition: A book or other written or printed work, regarded in terms of its content rather than its physical form.
example: Please read the text on page 20.
koChirpScript: text. 본문 또는 글 이라는 뜻입니다. Please read the text on page 20. 20페이지의 본문을 읽으세요.

definition: Introducing the second element in a comparison.
example: He is taller than me.
koChirpScript: than. 무엇무엇보다 라는 뜻으로, 비교급과 함께 씁니다. He is taller than me. 그는 나보다 키가 크다.

definition: Express gratitude to (someone), especially by saying “Thank you.”
example: I want to thank you for your help.
koChirpScript: thank. 감사하다 라는 뜻입니다. I want to thank you for your help. 도와주셔서 감사합니다.

definition: An expression of gratitude.
example: Thanks for the gift.
koChirpScript: thanks. 고맙다는 표현입니다. Thanks for the gift. 선물 고마워요.

definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing observed by the speaker.
example: Look at that car.
koGloss: det. 저; pron. 저것; conj. ~라는 것
koChirpScript: that. 저 또는 저것 이라는 뜻입니다. Look at that car. 저 차를 봐.

definition: Denoting one or more people or things already mentioned or assumed to be common knowledge.
example: The sun is shining.
koChirpScript: the. '그' 라는 뜻의 정관사입니다. The sun is shining. 해가 빛나고 있다.

definition: A building or outdoor area in which plays and other dramatic performances are given.
example: We are going to the theater tonight.
koExample: 우리는 오늘 밤 극장에 갈 것이다.
koChirpScript: theater. 극장 이라는 뜻입니다. We are going to the theater tonight. 우리는 오늘 밤 극장에 갈 것이다.

definition: Belonging to or associated with the people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
example: They love their new house.
koExample: 그들은 그들의 새 집을 아주 좋아한다.
koChirpScript: their. '그들의' 라는 뜻의 소유격입니다. They love their new house. 그들은 그들의 새 집을 아주 좋아한다.

definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
example: I saw them at the park.
koChirpScript: them. '그들을' 이라는 뜻의 목적격 대명사입니다. I saw them at the park. 나는 공원에서 그들을 봤다.

definition: At that time; at the time in question.
example: First I'll do my homework, then I'll watch TV.
koExample: 먼저 숙제를 하고, 그러고 나서 TV를 볼 것이다.
koChirpScript: then. 그때 또는 그러고 나서 라는 뜻입니다. First I'll do my homework, then I'll watch TV. 먼저 숙제를 하고, 그러고 나서 TV를 볼 것이다.

definition: In, at, or to that place or position.
example: The book is over there.
koChirpScript: there. 거기에 라는 뜻입니다. The book is over there. 책은 저기 있다.

definition: Used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
example: They are my friends.
koChirpScript: they. '그들은' 이라는 뜻의 주격 대명사입니다. They are my friends. 그들은 나의 친구들이다.

definition: An object that one need not, cannot, or does not wish to give a specific name to.
example: What is that thing?
koChirpScript: thing. 것 또는 물건 이라는 뜻입니다. What is that thing? 저것은 무엇인가요?

definition: Have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about someone or something.
example: What do you think about this plan?
koChirpScript: think. 생각하다 라는 뜻입니다. What do you think about this plan? 이 계획에 대해 어떻게 생각하세요?

definition: Constituting number three in a sequence; 3rd.
example: This is the third time I've called you.
koChirpScript: third. 세 번째의 라는 뜻입니다. This is the third time I've called you. 이번이 당신에게 전화한 세 번째이다.

definition: Feeling a need to drink.
example: I am thirsty.
koChirpScript: thirsty. 목마른 이라는 뜻입니다. I am thirsty. 나는 목이 마르다.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of ten and three; 13.
example: She is thirteen years old.
koChirpScript: thirteen. 숫자 13을 의미합니다. She is thirteen years old. 그녀는 13세이다.

definition: Equivalent to the product of three and ten; 30.
example: There are thirty days in April.
koChirpScript: thirty. 숫자 30을 의미합니다. There are thirty days in April. 4월은 30일까지 있다.

definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand or being indicated or experienced.
example: This is my house.
koChirpScript: this. 이 또는 이것 이라는 뜻입니다. This is my house. 이것은 나의 집이다.

definition: The number equivalent to the product of a hundred and ten; 1,000.
example: There are a thousand students in this school.
koExample: 이 학교에는 천 명의 학생이 있다.
koChirpScript: thousand. 숫자 천을 의미합니다. There are a thousand students in this school. 이 학교에는 천 명의 학생이 있다.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of one and two; one more than two; 3.
example: I have three cats.
koChirpScript: three. 숫자 3을 의미합니다. I have three cats. 나는 고양이가 세 마리 있다.

definition: Moving in one side and out of the other side of (an opening, channel, or location).
example: The train went through a tunnel.
koChirpScript: through. 무엇무엇을 통하여 라는 뜻입니다. The train went through a tunnel. 기차가 터널을 통과했다.

definition: The day of the week before Friday and following Wednesday.
example: I have a meeting on Thursday.
koChirpScript: Thursday. 목요일 이라는 뜻입니다. I have a meeting on Thursday. 나는 목요일에 회의가 있다.

definition: A piece of paper or small card that gives the holder a certain right, especially to enter a place, travel by public transport, or participate in an event.
example: I bought a ticket for the concert.
koChirpScript: ticket. 표 또는 티켓 이라는 뜻입니다. I bought a ticket for the concert. 나는 그 콘서트 표를 샀다.

definition: The indefinite continued progress of existence and events in the past, present, and future regarded as a whole.
example: What time is it?
koChirpScript: time. 시간 이라는 뜻입니다. What time is it? 지금 몇 시예요?

definition: In need of sleep or rest; weary.
example: I am very tired.
koChirpScript: tired. 피곤한 이라는 뜻입니다. I am very tired. 나는 매우 피곤하다.

definition: The name of a book, composition, or other artistic work.
example: What is the title of this book?
koChirpScript: title. 제목 이라는 뜻입니다. What is the title of this book? 이 책의 제목은 무엇인가요?

definition: Expressing motion in the direction of (a particular location).
example: I'm going to the store.
koChirpScript: to. 어디어디에 또는 어디어디로 라는 뜻의 전치사 또는 to 부정사를 만드는 역할을 합니다. I'm going to the store. 나는 가게에 갈 것이다.

definition: On or in the course of this present day.
example: What are you doing today?
koChirpScript: today. 오늘 이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing today? 오늘 뭐 하니?

definition: With or in proximity to another person or people.
example: Let's go to the party together.
koChirpScript: together. 함께 또는 같이 라는 뜻입니다. Let's go to the party together. 파티에 같이 가자.
